shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user stops or resumes publishing the video stream.
Occurs when a remote user stops or resumes publishing the video stream.
Callback when a remote user stops or resumes publishing the video stream.
Callback when a remote user stops or resumes publishing the video stream.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int remoteUid, bool muted)? onUserMuteVideo;
public virtual void OnUserMuteVideo(RtcConnection connection, uint remoteUid, bool muted) {}

section.p: When a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream, the SDK triggers this callback to inform the local user of the remote userâ€™s publishing status.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream. The SDK reports the remote user's stream publishing status to the local user.
When a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream, the SDK triggers this callback to report the remote user's stream status to the local user.
When a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream, the SDK triggers this callback to report the remote user's publishing status to the local user.
section.note: When the number of users (in communication) or hosts (in live streaming) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.
When the number of users (in communication scenario) or hosts (in live streaming scenario) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.
This callback may be inaccurate when the number of users (in communication) or hosts (in live broadcast) in the channel exceeds 32.
When the number of users (in communication scenario) or hosts (in live streaming scenario) in the channel exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.

plentry.pd:
Whether the remote user stops publishing the video stream:
: Stops publishing the video stream.
: Publishes the video stream.
